CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Very recently , we have successfully demonstrated that TA is a promising electron - donating moiety of medium band - gap conjugated copolymers for high performance polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.
1. TA: This is the material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is identified as a "promising electron - donating moiety" for high performance polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
TA: This material is a promising electron - donating moiety for high performance polymer solar cells.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Very recently , we have successfully demonstrated that TA is a promising electron - donating moiety of medium band - gap conjugated copolymers for high performance polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. TA: This is the abbreviation for a specific electron-donating moiety (molecular entity) in the context of the paragraph.
2. medium band-gap conjugated copolymers: This refers to a type of polymer, specifically a conjugated copolymer with a medium bandgap. The "medium bandgap" is a property of the copolymers.
3. high performance polymer solar cells: This is a type of solar cell made from high performance polymers. "High performance" is a property of the solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| medium bandgap |
| high performance |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Very recently , we have successfully demonstrated that TA is a promising electron - donating moiety of medium band - gap conjugated copolymers for high performance polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

1. TA: This is the abbreviation for a specific electron-donating moiety (molecular entity) in the context of the paragraph.
2. medium band-gap conjugated copolymers: This refers to a type of polymer with a specific bandgap property. The bandgap is an energy range where an electron can be promoted from the valence band to the conduction band. In this context, it is described as "medium bandgap," indicating a particular energy range.
3. high performance: This is a qualitative property value, describing the desired level of efficiency or effectiveness for the polymer solar cells.
4. polymer solar cells: This is a type of solar cell, which is a device that converts sunlight into electricity. The polymer material is a crucial component in this technology.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. medium bandgap: This is the relevant property value for the material (conjugated copolymers) mentioned in the paragraph. It refers to the energy range where an electron can be promoted from the valence band to the conduction band in the material.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| medium bandgap |

This table contains the property value "medium bandgap" that was identified in the paragraph as a relevant material property.
